mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( tnum, tpnum, tid, pname, amount, tprice ) VALUES ( PRODUCT_CART_TNUM_SEQ.nextval, #{tpnum}, #{tid}, #{pname}, #{amount}, #{tprice} )
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.tnum desc) as num, c.tnum,c.tpnum, c.tid, c.pname, p.pdetail, c.amount, regexp_replace(reverse(regexp_replace(reverse(to_char(tprice * amount)), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') as price, c.tcdate from cart c inner join product p on c.pname = p.pname where c.tid = #{tid}
select regexp_replace(reverse(regexp_replace(reverse(to_char(sum(tprice * amount))), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') as sumPrice from cart where tid=#{tid}
select count(*) from cart where tid =#{tid}
select count(*) from cart where tid=#{tid} and tpnum=#{tpnum}
mapper.update: update cart set pname = #{pname}, amount = #{amount}, tprice = #{tprice}, tcdate = systimestamp where tid = #{tid} and tpnum = #{tpnum}
